name: J.W. LEDFORD, Jr., petitioner, v. Gregory C. DOZIER, Commissioner, Georgia Department of Corrections, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
J.W. LEDFORD, Jr., petitioner,
v.
Gregory C. DOZIER, Commissioner, Georgia Department of Corrections, et al.
attorneys: Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice THOMAS and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
J.W. LEDFORD, Jr., petitioner,
v.
Gregory C. DOZIER, Commissioner, Georgia Department of Corrections, et al.
No. 16-9179 (26A1118).
Supreme Court of the United States
May 16, 2017.
Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice THOMAS and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
